translationEn: It is You we worship and You we ask for help.

arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
translationEn: Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear.

arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُوا وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا وَأَنْتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُؤْمِنِينَ
translationEn: So do not weaken and do not grieve, and you will be superior if you are [true] believers.
Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts find rest.
For indeed, with hardship will be ease.
